category.name: General
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: RDV_default_variant_condition
preference.preference_description: Specifies the default variant condition for NULL Variant Projects. Valid values are under the format "ItemInfo:OptionName:OptionValue", where: * In a non-MFK (Multifield key) environment, "ItemInfo" is the ID of any item that exists in the database (e.g. "GMC00723:Color:Red"). * In an MFK environment, "ItemInfo" is the key of any item which uniquely identifies the item (e.g. "item_id=GMC00723,object_name=topitem,object_type=Item:Color:Red"). The key is a delimited string which contains name/value pairs of item attributes usually of the form attr1=value1,attr2=value2.... etc, where attr1, attr2 are property internal names (e.g. "item_id=GMC00723,object_name=topitem,object_type=Item"). To include a delimiter character (e.g. ',' or '=') in a key, it should be escaped by a backslash character ('\'). E.g.: * if the item ID contains an equals sign (123=456), the key string would be: "item_id=123\=456,object_type=Document". * if the item ID contains a backslash (123\456), the key string would be: "item_id=123\456,object_type=Document".
